Episodes.Title: A Wing And A Prayer
Episodes.Plot: Entrepreneur Kiwi Mark Oremland had a dream. The dream was to own his own classic DC3 airliner, the once dominant lady of the aviation industry and fly it from England to New Zealand, retracing the famous journey of pioneer aviator Jean Batten.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
